description: standing man holding a yellow box with a white cloth in his PL hand; man wears outer kimono with round designs with pale tan flowers and background of green wavy lines and leaf motifs; green and orange under-kimonos; PL arm outstretched, PR hand in fist at chest
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play Irosoyuru nidai Genji 松二代源氏, performed at the Ichimura Theater, 11/1808.
title: The actor Matsumoto Kōshirō V as Morozumi, in reality Hakamadare Yasusuke
